fields.label: File Name
fields.name: fileName
fields.description: Must match the file name above (NOT including .md)! This is what makes it live editable.

fields.label: Class Name
fields.name: className
fields.description: The class name for the container, default: "mx-auto"

fields.label: Header Class Name
fields.name: headerClassName
fields.description: The class name for the header, default: "font-extrabold leading-tight tracking-tighter text-primary"

fields.label: Header Color
fields.name: headerColor
fields.description: The color for the header, default: "text-primary"

fields.label: Bold Class Name
fields.name: boldClassName
fields.description: The class name for the bold text, default: "bg-clip-text text-transparent"

fields.label: Bold Color
fields.name: boldColor
fields.description: The color for the bold text, default: "bg-gradient-to-b from-yellow-400 to-red-600"

fields.label: Paragraph Class Name
fields.name: pClassName
fields.description: The class name for the paragraph, default: "mt-8 max-w-[700px] px-2 text-center text-xl"

fields.label: Paragraph Color
fields.name: pColor
fields.description: The color for the paragraph, default: "text-muted-foreground"

fields.label: Card Background Color
fields.description: Write Tailwind CSS color names or hex codes e.g. 'bg-gradient-to-b from-black to-purple-600'
fields.name: backgroundColor

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
